snippet.title: There's Always a Madman: Do Your Worst announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist the spy thriller interactive novel "There's Always a Madman: Do Your Worst" on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2960890/Theres_Always_a_Madman_Do_Your_Worst

Do you have what it takes to prevent a silver-loving madman from destroying the Golden Gate Bridge?  Find out when the game releases in Q4 2024.
